title: Projects
brief: These are some of the projects I've worked on recently. Want to see more? Check out my Github.

contents.title: Project Introduction
contents.content: GUM is a project which is an outsource project from a company. The project is to build an official website and a dashboard for the company. The official website provides the introduction of the courses and the registration function. The dashboard provides the management of the courses and the query of the registration data.

contents.title: Project Run Down
bulletPoints: Construct site product pages with RWD design.
Construct common pages such as about us, contact us, and so on.

details.title: Portfolio Website for a UI/UX Designer V2

contents.title: Project Introduction
contents.content: This portfolio website is build for my wife to enforce her UI/UX ability.

contents.title: Project Run Down
bulletPoints: Follow the figma design from the designer.
